Topic.Title: Beginner needing help interacting with objects

Posts.EditableText: I seem to be stuck and can't seem to be able to get unstuck. I'm working through the tutorial which seems, by the way, to be based on Quest 4 not 5 as the menus are different. Anyway back to the subject - I have set a newspaper as an object with a couch as the parent but can't interact with it ie pick it up, read it etc. All seems to be well if I make the room (lounge) the parent but not otherwise. Any assistance appreciated.
Posts.HTML: I seem to be stuck and can't seem to be able to get unstuck. I'm working through the tutorial which seems, by the way, to be based on Quest 4 not 5 as the menus are different. Anyway back to the subject - I have set a newspaper as an object with a couch as the parent but can't interact with it ie pick it up, read it etc. All seems to be well if I make the room (lounge) the parent but not otherwise. Any assistance appreciated.

Posts.EditableText: Objects in objects will only be accessible, if the parent objects are container objects (like surface)
Posts.HTML: Objects in objects will only be accessible, if the parent objects are container objects (like surface)

Posts.EditableText: Thank you I new it had to be something simple.
Posts.HTML: Thank you I new it had to be something simple.
